name: lvreduce
description:
LVReduce shrinks a logical volume (LV) by deleting unused space. This can free up disk space and improve performance. LVReduce is only applicable to LVM logical volumes and performs a non-destructive online operation, shrinking the volume while maintaining data integrity.

The key aspects to understand are:

- **Online Shrink:** Changes occur without detaching the volume, ensuring continuous data access.
- **Data Preservation:** All data within the logical volume remains intact throughout the shrinking process.
- **Incosistent Mode:** If the volume is in inconsistent state or unmountable,LVReduce will report an error and exit. It only works with consistent, mounted LV.
- 
Space Reclaim : LVReduce works by identifying and reclaiming unused space within the logical volume, effectively reducing its size.
- **Safe Operation:** When used correctly, LVReduce provides a safe and reliable way to manage LVM logical volume sizes.
